org.jfree.chart

Class MouseWheelHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.MouseWheelHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

     class MouseWheelHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.io.Serializable
    A class that handles mouse wheel events for the ChartPanel class. Mouse wheel event support was added in JDK 1.4, so this class will be omitted from JFreeChart if you build it using JDK 1.3.
    Since:
    1.0.13

      • getZoomFactor

        public double getZoomFactor()
        Returns the current zoom factor. The default value is 0.10 (ten percent).
        Returns:
        The zoom factor.
        See Also:
